segments.text: OK , so are you ready to learn how to bake a cake ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Almost , let me just put my apron on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , so the first thing we are going to do is pre-heat the oven , that way we have it at the desired temperature once we finish preparing everything . Set it to three hundred and seventy five degrees Fahrenheit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No we are gonna make the batter . Take some butter and sugar and mix it lightly until you have a nice consistency . Then add some vanilla extract and eggs and continue mixing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do I have to use a whisk or can I use the electric mixer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Go ahead and use the mixer , but put it on medium speed . I'm gonna sift the flour and baking powder separately and then we can mix it with milk and the rest of the ingredients .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , so now we need a baking pan right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , but grease and flour it first so the cake won't stick to it when it bakes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Done . So how long do we bake it for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can leave it in there for about twenty five minutes . Then we let it cool for ten minutes before we remove the cake from the pan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! This was a lot easier than I thought !
segments.speaker: S2
